title: Report a Potential Data Breach
description: An agency employee reports that they may have accidentally exposed citizen data, triggering a data breach response.

tasks.description: Receive the initial report of the potential breach from the employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: The IT security officer documents the initial report.

tasks.description: Immediately launch an investigation to determine the scope of the breach: what data was exposed and how many citizens are affected.
tasks.expected_outcome: The security team begins a forensic investigation.

tasks.description: Notify the agency's leadership and legal counsel of the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: The security officer escalates the incident to the appropriate leadership.
